content: anna cowl a knitting pattern by barb fritz an easy lace pattern creates a beautiful light cowl perfect for a gift for a friend or for you create in a bulky worsted or dk yarn by varying the number of lace repeats designed to fit close to the neck the design can be easily be modified by adding more repeats knit in the round the cowl works up quickly materials 1 50-g skein of bulky worsted or dk yarn sample shown in takhi yarns lana 92 yards / skein needles and notions 16 circular needle 1-2 sizes larger than ball band calls for sample illustrated knit on 10 5 s worsted samples knit on 9 s dk samples knit on 7 s stitch marker and tapestry needle to weave in ends size 17 w x 8 high gauge bulky 3 to 10 sts in lace pattern aran / worsted 2-1/2 to 10 sts in lace pattern directions co 60 bulky / 70 aran / worsted / 80 dk sts on circular needle place marker and join in round knit three rounds in seed stitch k1 p1 in first and third rounds p1 k 1 in second round and begin lace pattern work lace chart 6 7 8 times completing two patterns knit three rounds of seed stitch and bind off knitwise loosely weave in ends and block lightly 1 | p a g e pattern ©2013 barb fritz chart created with aire river design font with permission begin lace chart round 1 k1 k2tog k4 yo k1 yo ssk round 2 and all even rounds knit round 3 k1 k2tog k3 yo k1 yo k1 ssk round 5 k1 k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 ssk round 7 k1 k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k3 ssk round 9 k1 k2tog yo k1 yo k4 ssk round 11 k1 k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k3 ssk round 13 k1 k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 ssk round 15 k1 k2tog k3 yo k1 yo k1 ssk                      15                      13                      11                      9                      7                      5                      3           
